compliant.section: When you engage with our support team, in addition to your account information, we may ask you to provide additional information about your issue, which may include information about your technology, software, internet connection, or screenshots .
compliant.legal provisions: Data minimization: Processing is limited to what is necessary. Legitimate interest: Support interactions are necessary for contract performance and our legitimate interest in providing support.

compliant.section: To submit information to a community site, we may require you to create an account within the community (we will collect your account registration information like name, email, company, address, and phone number) .
compliant.legal provisions: Consent: Users must consent to the collection of this data for community features. Legitimate interest: Our legitimate interest in fostering a community may justify some data processing, but consent is generally required.

compliant.section: If you have an account in the Services, we will associate your community membership and activities with your Services account .
compliant.legal provisions: Legitimate interest: This association is likely justified under legitimate interest if it's necessary for service functionality or to provide a unified user experience. Transparency is key.

compliant.section: As a community member, you and other members may submit questions, provide answers, engage with members through chat or comments, create content or webinars to share with the community, or solicit feedback or help from other community members .
compliant.legal provisions: Consent: Users must consent to the processing of their data for these community activities.

compliant.section: We receive information about you directly from you when you engage with the Site and automatically when you engage with the Site or open or click the emails we send you (See Information You Provide Us and Cookies and Other Tracking Technology) .
compliant.legal provisions: Consent and Transparency: Requires clear consent for data collection through cookies and tracking technologies. Transparency: Providing clear information about data collection practices.

compliant.section: We receive information from third-party sources like lead generation providers, content sponsors, event sponsors, or social media platforms .
compliant.legal provisions: Legitimate interest and Source Transparency: Justifying data collection from third parties based on legitimate interest. Transparency: Informing users about the sources of personal data.

compliant.section: The information we collect from third-party sources may include marketing or demographic information, contact information (name, email, company, address, job title), information about your profile on those platforms, or information about purchasing intent .
compliant.legal provisions: Legitimate interest and Source Transparency: Justifying the specific data categories collected from third parties. Transparency: Providing specific details about the information collected from these sources.

compliant.section: Partner Programs: We have several partner programs that we make available: our developer platform program (which allows third-party application providers to build integrations to Zapier) and our expert program (which connects experts who help our customers set up and use the Services) .
compliant.legal provisions: Legitimate interest: Partner programs can be justified under legitimate interest if they support the core functions of the service and benefit users.

compliant.section: Partners may also help us to market and promote our Services, generate leads, or they may resell our Services . We may add partner programs in the future .
compliant.legal provisions: Legitimate interest: Partner activities must be aligned with legitimate business purposes and not overly intrusive to user privacy.

compliant.section: Through partner programs, we collect account registration information (like name, email address, company, and phone number), information about an individualâ€™s technical skill set, comments, questions or feedback, rating or ranking information, images, content, or other information you provide .
compliant.legal provisions: Consent and Legitimate Interest: Depending on the specific data and how it's used, consent or legitimate interest may apply. Data Minimization: Ensuring that data collection is limited to what is necessary for the specific partner program.

compliant.section: We may also receive information from our partners (like business contact information, address, job title, email address, or phone number) .
compliant.legal provisions: Legitimate interest and Source Transparency: Justifying the collection of business contact information from partners. Transparency: Clearly informing users about this data sharing.

compliant.section: Payment Processing Information: When you create a paid account within the Services or otherwise initiate a transaction with us, we will use a third-party payment processor to process the payment .
compliant.legal provisions: Contract Performance and Legal Obligation: Processing payment information is necessary for contract performance. Compliance with legal obligations related to financial transactions.

compliant.section: We do not collect your credit card number, expiration date, or pin number .
compliant.legal provisions: Data Minimization: Not collecting sensitive payment data aligns with data minimization principles.

compliant.section: The transaction details we retain are those details that allow us to verify that you paid for the Services or transaction, including price, currency, date of payment, payment method, name, and account name .
compliant.legal provisions: Legal Obligation: Retaining limited transaction details for accounting and legal compliance purposes.

compliant.section: Technical, Device, and Connection Information: When you use the Services or interact with our Site, we automatically collect information about the device you use to access the Site or Services .
compliant.legal provisions: Legitimate interest: Collecting technical information can be justified for security purposes, improving service functionality, and understanding user behavior. However, this data should be anonymized or pseudonymized whenever possible.

non_compliant.section: We may combine this information with the information we collect .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Purpose Limitation: Combining data from different sources requires a compatible legal basis for each processing purpose. The policy lacks specificity about the purposes for combining data.
non_compliant.amend: Clearly state the specific purposes for combining data from different sources and ensure that a valid legal basis (e.g., consent, legitimate interest) exists for each purpose.

non_compliant.section: We will combine the information you provide and the information we receive with your account information .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Purpose Limitation: Combining data requires a compatible legal basis for each processing purpose. The policy lacks specificity about the purposes for combining data.
non_compliant.amend: Provide specific and transparent information about the purposes for combining account information with other data collected. Ensure a valid legal basis exists for each purpose.

non_compliant.section: We will combine that information with your account information .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Purpose Limitation: Combining payment transaction details with account information requires a compatible legal basis. The policy lacks specificity about the purpose.
non_compliant.amend: Clearly state the specific purpose for combining payment transaction details with account information and ensure a valid legal basis (e.g., legal obligation for accounting) exists.
